data.scheme_name: Revised Assistance For Technology Acquisition Scheme - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides up to 75% of cost for acquiring latest technology/machinery with a maximum of Rs 50 lakhs.
data.eligibility:
1. All Manufacturing MSMEs - Having an URC and Haryana Udyam Memorandum (HUM). 
  2. Should have obtained NoC/CLU from competent authority. 
  3. Should be in commercial and regular production. 
  4. Should present Patent certificate mentioning the proof of validity of patent. 
  5. Can avail the benefits of the scheme only once in the 3 year period of operation of the scheme. Should be ZED Certified.
data.conditions:
1. The item of manufacture should not fall in the restrictive list as notified by the State Government. 
  2. Should demonstrate improvement in performance due to acquisition. 
  3. Mere purchase will not be considered as acquisition. Only one machine will be eligible in such cases.
data.beneficiaries:
1. All Manufacturing MSMEs - Having an URC and Haryana Udyam Memorandum (HUM). 
  2. Should have obtained NoC/CLU from competent authority. Should be in commercial and regular production. 
  3. Should present Patent certificate mentioning the proof of validity of patent. 
  4. Can avail the benefits of the scheme only once in the 3 year period of operation of the scheme. 
  5. Should be ZED Certified.
data.prerequisites:
1. The item of manufacture should not fall in the restrictive list as notified by the State Government. 
  2. Should demonstrate improvement in performance due to acquisition.
  3. Mere purchase will not be considered as acquisition. 
  4. Only one machine will be eligible in such cases.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: The Government came out with scheme to encourage the purchase of latest technology by the MSMEs.
data.objective: The objective of the scheme is to identify and facilitate acquisition of new technology by Manufacturing Enterprises from the MSME sector.
data.description: Through this scheme, the Government would provide up to 75% of cost for acquiring technology/machinery with latest technology from premier National (institutes from the top 100 ranks on the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) across categories)/ International Institutes (institutes from the top 150 ranks on the US News and World Report rankings)/ Patented Technology from domestic (patented with in last 10 years of the date of technology acquisition)/ foreign companies (patented within last 5 years of the date of technology acquisition), maximum of Rs 50 lakh.
data.how_to_apply: Application on prescribed Form (Annexure-I) for the reimbursement of cost of acquisition of technology/machinery with latest technology along with listed documents would be submitted to the Director/ Director General of MSMEs on the web Portal of the department.
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The disbursement will be done within 7 days from the date of sanction of application.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf
Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: All Manufacturing Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs
